tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE incidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    incident_description TEXT,
    incident_location VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Reporting_and_documentation_of_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_description VARCHAR(255),
    incident_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_location VARCHAR(100),
    incident_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Progress_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    note_content TEXT,
    note_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE progress_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    note_date DATE,
    note_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reporting (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE documentation (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    doc_date DATE,
    doc_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProgressNotes (
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id UUID,
    note_text TEXT,
    note_date DATE,
    note_author VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceReports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(255),
    incident_id UUID,
    document_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Incidents(incident_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES LegalDocuments(document_id)
);
